TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: I had no direct involvement in the <color=lightblue>Ash Twin Project</color>, but I was among its supporters. There is little I want more in life than for the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> to be found.
SOLANUM: I consider it a great pity that the <color=lightblue>Ash Twin Project</color> was unable to be activated. Perhaps one day, my clan will find another way.
